column1: English Sent: While some plates come towards each other and form convergent boundary.
Hindi Tansl: kuCa pleteM eka-xUsare ke karIba AwI hEM Ora aBisAriwa parisImA kA nirmANa karawI hEM.
Anu Translation:  jaba ki kuCa mulammA lagAwA hE eka xUsare Ora rUpa saMsqwa sImA kI ora Aie
K#jaba ki#kuCa#mulammA lagAwA hE#Aie#-#-#eka xUsare#Ora#rUpa#-#saMsqwa sImA kI ora
